description: Reading a(n) expansion from left to right, run lengths strictly decrease.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (group)a048321 n = a048321_list !! (n-1)a048321_list = filter f [0..] where   f x = all (< 0) $ zipWith (-) (tail zs) zs         where zs =  map length $ group $ show x-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 01 2015
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Feb 15 1999.
